text: A kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia oragh. E nguibar ekiam Jerusalemɨn ghuavanadi. Eghtɨ gumazitam Gumazamizibar Otarim isɨva, Judan Arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko ofa gamir gumazir ekiabar anɨngam. Eghtɨ me a isɨ kot datɨgh, egh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghsɨva akabar akɨram, egh me kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm suam, An aremegham. Egh me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghsɨva, a inigh Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar dafaribar arɨgham.
